The measure I introduced continues this important work by directing the US Department of Justice to publish and update the amount of money that has been stolen by the authoritarian leaders of kleptocratic regimes and recovered by US law enforcement. This straightforward measure would demonstrate America's commitment to the rule of law around the world and send a powerful message to those suffering under kleptocracies that the United States is serious about supporting them.
